original_title: 夫の目の前で犯●れて― 暴辱に屈した若妻 笹本結愛
overview: A young wife, Miki, and her husband, Koichi, reunite with Shimotsuka, a former subordinate of Koichi, at a nearby construction site. The next day, Shimotsuka, a construction site security guard who distributes earplugs to neighboring homes as a measure against noise, visits the couple's house as well. But that wasn't his only purpose...
title: Fucked In Front Of Her Husband - Young Wife Succumbs To Humiliation... Yurara Sasamoto
